name: Mr. Cubie in A World of Worry
name_original: Mr. Cubie in A World of Worry
description:
Help MR. CUBIE escape a world full of so many worries and bright blue boxes which must be avoided! Master 5 levels that will test your sanity!

This is my first full game! BIG thanks to BRACKYS for the tutorial and to my friend MIKE DEE for the sick music!!!

I hope you have fun with it and leave a comment! 

Tools : 

  • Unity 5.4 (C#) 
  • Visual Studio 
  • Pixlr X
  • YouTube (Brackys)
